H0.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Charlie Brooks

H3.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Ross Kemp

A4.text: Brooks married actor Ross Kemp in 2002 and divorced him in 2009.

A5.text: Brooks married former racehorse trainer and author Charlie Brooks after divorcing Ross Kemp in 2009.
